title: elley2kk
author: elley2kk
content: I made a deposit https://prnt.sc/-kDG4vbCvOSE (0.009 btc) played, gained balance, after all the games, I decided to make payments. "First test" went in (0.00200900 btc - 0.001btc in commission), then started to make payouts https://prnt.sc/bDOFYktZ6SkT and nothing came, no confirmation, nothing at all for the second day. Gave my last 0.009 btc to withdraw 0.001 btc, nice, cool. I consider this a SCAM. @nftonspin what do you say to that?

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: have you contacted them through email or on their Twitter account? their representative was active earlier but didn't see your post since they logged out hours before you made your complaint post. I sent them a PM just in case they miss your complaint when they go online in the forum again.

comments.author: elley2kk
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on May 27, 2023, 06:33:42 PMhave you contacted them through email or on their Twitter account? their representative was active earlier but didn't see your post since they logged out hours before you made your complaint post. I sent them a PM just in case they miss your complaint when they go online in the forum again.I wrote to the e-mail address, but got no reply.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: How did you come across this site?Feels like a confirmed scam if they refused to make payments and respond to your messages

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: elley2kk on May 27, 2023, 08:29:42 PMQuote from: acroman08 on May 27, 2023, 06:33:42 PMhave you contacted them through email or on their Twitter account? their representative was active earlier but didn't see your post since they logged out hours before you made your complaint post. I sent them a PM just in case they miss your complaint when they go online in the forum again.I wrote to the e-mail address, but got no reply.you could try and wait for a few more days, sometimes casinos take days(not that I approve of it) to reply to an issue. that being said, their claim of up to 900% cashback and their refund policy, when a gambler is not satisfied with the gambling site, is a little too good to be true which usually means it should be avoided. anyway, I still do hope they pay you your winnings.

comments.author: elley2kk
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on May 28, 2023, 01:03:58 AMQuote from: elley2kk on May 27, 2023, 08:29:42 PMQuote from: acroman08 on May 27, 2023, 06:33:42 PMhave you contacted them through email or on their Twitter account? their representative was active earlier but didn't see your post since they logged out hours before you made your complaint post. I sent them a PM just in case they miss your complaint when they go online in the forum again.I wrote to the e-mail address, but got no reply.you could try and wait for a few more days, sometimes casinos take days(not that I approve of it) to reply to an issue. that being said, their claim of up to 900% cashback and their refund policy, when a gambler is not satisfied with the gambling site, is a little too good to be true which usually means it should be avoided. anyway, I still do hope they pay you your winnings.I hope for something good, too. But already hopes are dying, it's been two days, and still no payment.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: elley2kk on May 28, 2023, 08:50:48 AMI hope for something good, too. But already hopes are dying, it's been two days, and still no payment.It's ok to have hope but you should be realistic about your expectation this is a lesson learned that when playing pick the casino with an already established casino, if you are going to test a new casino test it with money that you can afford to lose.This is the first time I read about that platform, but it's good that this early they are exposed if ever they will not pay you, you have done well by sharing your experience, wait one week more if you did not receive anything then change the title to confirmed scam.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 27, 2023, 11:48:17 PMHow did you come across this site?The first question that stike me was the same! @elley2kkAsking it once again? From where did you hear about this site? I haven't seen anything about them previously in the forum. As confirmed by everyone and me that you have been scammed. If you had found about this site from another website or forum then do share. It will only help others as everyone would know about them next time they do a search here or in Google.

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on May 28, 2023, 03:01:50 PMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 27, 2023, 11:48:17 PMHow did you come across this site?Asking it once again? From where did you hear about this site? I haven't seen anything about them previously in the forum.Both of you aren't regular in the gambling board. As a result, both of you aren't aware of them. NFTonSPIN has an ANN thread in the gambling board: NFTonSPIN.com - Leading Crypto Casino With Get Full Refund If Not Satisfied@elley2kk, They are showing fake data of active users, the withdrawal fee is 0.001 BTC, NFTonSPIN doesn't have gambling license. What has attracted you to play at NFTonSPIN by making a deposit? NFTonSpin says that they have automatic withdrawal system, and the withdrawal takes only 10 minutes to be processed. Where you made 9 withdrawals and none of those were processed. NFTonSPIN.com doesn't look like a legit casino.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: btw did you check all the terms on that website? like how many wagers do you need to be able to withdraw your bonus? because even if you register there you will get a free 0.0007 BTC and it must be wagered over 40x to be able to withdraw.even skenthal who is able to withdraw the bonus he got from the website says he wouldn't deposit any real money to this site.Quote from: skenthal on May 24, 2023, 03:28:01 PMtbh, i decided to write in here after 4 days of waiting thinking that they might process it due to community pressure in here, and actually they processed it in 1 hour after writing in here and writing them through email, i m not sure, it would be processed if i didnt do something like this and if amount was higher, but in the end they paid it.But imo i wouldnt deposit any real money coz, like many others said, offers are way too good to be true, and still site seems very amateurish (layout, games etc)But again like i said, they PAID it...but in the end, i just wondered why did you deposit that much money to a website that i believe is a scam website?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I have left them a negative on their profile, of-course reversible if they respond positively but I have some doubts if they will do this. A trust flag will also be applied if nothing happens in the next few days.Quote from: Mahdirakib on May 28, 2023, 04:43:46 PMBoth of you aren't regular in the gambling board. As a result, both of you aren't aware of them. NFTonSPIN has an ANN thread in the gambling board: Thanks for the info.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Sorry for your loss OP!However, am a bit surprised, disappointed at the same time, that there are users who still fall for such scams. It was obvious from their Ann thread that they weren't serious. They didn't even bother to buy a coper membership and post a proper announcement. Besides, it was also obvious that they weren't serious based on the bonuses they were offering, which were too good to be true.My advice is to create a type 3 flag against them and wait for dt members to support it.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: That's clearly a scam, the OP shouldn't have waited long to conclude. First the selection of the name of the casino with "NFT" where they don't even implement this type of asset on betting (nothing but random branding). Second, I'm not that familiar with the appearance of casinos out there, but on a cursory UI inspection it seems completely unprofessional for a casino that can offer 900% cash back. Thirdly, there is no serious initiative of casino representatives to service and respond to reviews on official threads.
